thread.title: Liberia: Bartekwa Troubled By Animals On Somalia Drive
thread.title_full: Liberia: Bartekwa Troubled By Animals On Somalia Drive

title: Liberia: Bartekwa Troubled By Animals On Somalia Drive
text:
Somalia: Somalia, Where 95 Percent of Girls Undergo FGM 
He said the situation often causes traffic jam and panic among commuters and community dwellers when they are escaping the cows. 
Bartekwa's statements were contained in a communication to House Speaker J. Alex Tyler dated August 4, 2015, in which he craved the indulgence of Plenary to invite the Ministers of Agriculture and Justice as well as the Inspector General of the Liberia National Police to explain why they cannot regulate the movement of the animals. 
Following the reading of the communication in Session on Tuesday, the Body sent it to the House Committees on Health and Agriculture for review and recommendations with the mandate to report in two weeks. Liberia
